#summary Concept of FileManager/FileDialog.

= Problem =

  * QFileDialog (QFD) uses hardcoded QFileSystemModel (QFSM) (or native win/mac/kde/gnome FileDialog).
  * QFSM uses hardcoded local filesystem.
  * Them we can't use QFD for virtual filesystems (VFS').

= Solution =

  * Add own QAbstractFileHandlers for handling VFSs'.
  * Use own QFileDialog successor - with own QAbstractItemModel (QAIM) or QFSM successor.

= ??? =
